name: Extermination Cars Stadium
description:
Has anyone offered you the opportunity to destroy cars and not suffer anything? In return you get money and fame. It sounds like something dirty in the middle, doesn't it? Well, that's the reality.

Extermination Cars Stadium presents a new type of racing - competition game where only one can emerge victorious. It's like the tradition in Eastern Europe with the breaking of Easter eggs, only the strongest remains behind. Prepare your car in such a way that it can withstand the blows it will receive from others. Be very careful, you risk being called the king of the stadium if you continue at this rate. Sounds good, right? Then show everyone who the real destroyer is by eliminating them all and remain the winning driver until the last level!
Game Features :
- 4 destroyer cars
- 10 levels
- Timer
- Level of destruction of the car
